channel.title: Thalaivar on Vinoth Babu Rants
channel.description: Recent content in Thalaivar on Vinoth Babu Rants

item.title: The last superstar
item.description: Today’s stars are commodities stocked in a chain of supermarkets. They can never be superstar. We all like Rajinikanth more because he’s one of us — richer and more known, yes, and yet like us in the ways that matter.
